data.what_is: Raising awareness, attracting like-minded people, engaging supporters: Building a movement has never been easier. And still it's hard - Managing a load of different tools and apps, synchronizing data across all platforms while staying GDPR-compliant. That's why we created Cambuildr, the first all-in-one solution for digital movements - made in Europe.
data.product_description: Raising awareness, attracting like-minded people, engaging supporters: Building a movement has never been easier. And still it's hard - Managing a load of different tools and apps, synchronizing data across all platforms while staying GDPR-compliant. That's why we created Cambuildr, the first all-in-one solution for digital movements - made in Europe.

pricing_plans.plan_description: The perfect option for those beginning their campaign journey and desiring to build and authentic, engaged digital community.
plan_features: Unlimited engagement-apps: polls, quizes, UGC and more
A/B/n testing for emails and landing pages
AI Heatmap Analysis of Landing Pages and Social Media Posts

pricing_plans.plan_price:
Starting at EUR790.00
2500 Contacts Per Month
pricing_plans.plan_description: Already have an existing base that you want to launch to the next level? The Advanced Level is a perfect fit for change-makers who want to grow a smaller community into a larger one.
plan_features: Everything included in the Start Level
Onboarding workshop with a digital mobilization expert

pricing_plans.plan_description: So you wanna do really big things with a massive community of supporters? Sounds great - let's talk! Our Enterprise solutions can help you achieve the impact you want with everything from white label options to coordinated accounts for influencer and candidate management.
plan_features: Everything included in the Advanced Level

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CamBuildr?
Its drag-and-drop editor feature with easy accessibility of data across all platforms

What do you dislike about CamBuildr?
Sometimes features don't run smoothly while getting started

What problems is CamBuildr solving and how is that benefiting you?
Collecting contacts, building landing pages and mail campaigns
